h2: What do I put in your breakfast?
paragraph: Dressed formally, I watch the humans cook from my vantage point. You'll grow into it they said...

h2: Mr R and Mrs B make a baby, what is it called?
paragraph: I watch my colleagues interrogate the toilet in this lesser of police stations. It's a tough customer though, and is yet to crack...
Like a tree, I am a great purifier! I take in dirt and spit out freshness, and I never hear a word of gratitude!

h2: If nut is 55, and green is 49, what is fruit?
paragraph: A draw under a bed? What could that mean? Twice I've been haired, but now I am clean!

h2: If I were to formally sing you happy birthday, how many syllables would there be?
paragraph: In Alladins cave anything is possible, such a rag tag assortment of riches are here. I will be patient, awaiting my master...

h2: Which is the biggest wine producing country in the world?
paragraph: Liquified fruit though I be, I do indeed intend to flee! I will not go back - though my escape is barred by solid oak, I fear the lash upon the rack!
